snippet: A combination of National Bank of Abu Dhabi and First Gulf Bank would create one of the largest banks in the Middle East and Africa.
abstract: National Bank of Abu Dhabi and First Gulf Bank confirm they are in talks for possible merger, sending shares soaring.
lead_paragraph: A combination of National Bank of Abu Dhabi and First Gulf Bank would create one of the largest banks in the Middle East and Africa.

headline.main: Two Abu Dhabi Banks Confirm Discussions on a Merger
headline.print_headline: Two Abu Dhabi Banks Confirm Discussions on a Merger
